title: Fuel economy standards affect energy efficiency

content.question: Which of the following is a way for the government to encourage efficient energy use?

choices.label: Requiring higher fuel economy standards for new cars
Implementing government subsidies to keep gasoline prices low
Raising the speed limit from 55 to 70 miles per hour
Limiting the development of public transportation systems
Removing all taxes from gasoline at the fuel pump

content.answer: Requiring higher fuel economy standards for new cars

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
